participant_1.background:
I live in the US and work out in my home gym every day to stay fit
i am a dog walker.
i am in the army.
my grand children mean the world to me.
I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record.

participant_2.background:
My most valued material possession is my journal, because it's a place where I can be honest with myself and explore my thoughts and feelings.
I created the mobile that hangs above my baby's crib.
i drive a black car.
i am a great cook.
I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood.

content.text: Hi, I am in the US and I work out in my home gym every day to stay fit. What do you do for exercise?
I am not as fit as I could be, but I do enjoy cooking healthy meals. I do have a black car that I love to drive.
I love to cook as well! I am also in the army, do you have any interesting stories from your neighborhood?
I collect interesting stories from my neighborhood, but the most interesting one is about the time I created the mobile that hangs above my baby's crib.
That is really cool! I have never made anything like that before. Do you have any kids of your own?
I have one little boy and he is my everything. I am so glad that I have him in my life.
I love that! I have four grandchildren and they are the light of my life.
That is wonderful! I am sure that they are all very happy to have you in their lives.
Thank you, I am very happy to be a part of their lives
